content: @Johannes Dahlström One thing I often do is #[cfg_attr(test, allow(dead_code))] or similar. That way they don't bother me during cargo test -- just make sure to cargo build --release at some point too.

cjgillot said:

You can set deny-warnings = false in config.toml for rustc.

TIL you can do that. Guess I glossed over that when setting up my environment.

@scottmcm Thanks, that's not a half-bad solution, although it's mostly useful in solo projects. If there are several people contributing, my local workflow shouldn't affect others – that's what out-of-tree .cargo/config ought to be for.
